!Tablet of Vision: Thoughts beyond your understanding race through your mind, and you see a vision of a black knight!%% You sense the existence of the next Resonance Amulet.%% It is in the possession of a female Kamael warrior near the Tablet located southeast of Hunters Village.%% She is battling a great white-winged being, who has been ordered to keep the Kamael from learning the secret about themselves.
